title: Textured Storybook
description: Ce style évoque une illustration de livre pour enfants moderne, caractérisée par une texture granuleuse imitant les crayons de couleur et la gouache sèche. L'esthétique est plate, fantaisiste et artisanale, privilégiant des formes naïves et des couleurs vibrantes mais mates.
prompt: A charming, high-quality children's book illustration style depicting {{subject}}. The artwork mimics the tactile texture of dry media, blending the look of colored pencils, wax crayons, and matte gouache on rough grain paper. The rendering is distinctly flat and 2D, avoiding photorealistic perspective in favor of a whimsical, hand-drawn aesthetic. The color palette is warm and inviting, dominated by shades of {{primary_color}} with playful, scribbled contrasts in {{accent_color}}. The strokes are visible, energetic, and slightly messy, giving the image a raw, artisanal feel. The edges of shapes are imperfect and organic, enhancing the quirky character design. The lighting is flat and uniform, emphasizing the rich surface texture and the interplay of colors rather than shadows. The overall mood is creative, innocent, and cozy, textured illustration, flat design, crayon texture, whimsical art, matte finish, visible strokes, playful character design, high resolution scan, rough paper grain, indie editorial style
background_prompt: A highly textured, flat background scene featuring a creative environment filled with eclectic sketches, pinned posters, and organic shapes. The scene is rendered in a {{primary_color}} wash with {{accent_color}} details, using a dry brush and colored pencil technique. Elements like potted plants, paper scraps, shelves, and geometric patterns create a busy, artistic atmosphere without a central subject. The texture is grainy and matte, resembling a crowded sketchbook page or a decorated studio wall, framing the center with decorative clutter.

title: Doodle Pop
description: Ce style combine des illustrations de type gribouillage à l'encre noire avec des aplats de couleurs vives et limitées sur un fond crème. Il se distingue par l'utilisation de motifs rayés, de formes géométriques abstraites et d'éléments graphiques ludiques comme des traits d'action.
prompt: A playful, hand-drawn doodle illustration of {{subject}} rendered in a bold ink sketch style with thick, expressive black outlines. The composition uses a strict, limited color palette featuring broad flat fills of {{primary_color}} and small pops of {{accent_color}}, set against a clean, soft cream or off-white background. The aesthetic is characterized by high-contrast graphic elements, including heavy diagonal stripe patterns, geometric shapes, and whimsical floating details like squiggles, dots, and comic-style action lines surrounding the subject. The rendering is flat and vector-like, mimicking a modern corporate creative sketch with a spontaneous, energetic vibe. No shading, high contrast, clean linework, minimalist composition, 2D vector art, ink illustration, creative motif.
background_prompt: A creative pattern of hand-drawn doodle elements and abstract shapes scattered across a neutral background. The scene features bold black and white striped geometric blocks, oversized stylized organic leaves, and playful scribble marks like spirals, asterisks, and motion lines. Scattered handwritten typography fragments and empty speech bubbles add texture to the environment. The design uses flat fills of {{primary_color}} and sharp hits of {{accent_color}} to create a vibrant, chaotic yet balanced framing device or wallpaper texture, completely void of any central character.

title: Modern Vector
description: Ce style se caractérise par une illustration vectorielle plate aux couleurs vives et aux formes géométriques épurées. Il privilégie les aplats de couleurs saturées, l'absence de contours et un ombrage minimaliste pour une esthétique moderne et professionnelle.
prompt: A high-quality flat vector illustration of {{subject}}, designed in a trendy modern corporate art style reminiscent of tech startup branding. The visual aesthetic is defined by bold geometric shapes, exaggerated yet pleasing proportions, and razor-sharp edges with absolutely no outlines. The lighting is uniform and flat, utilizing only hard-edged, solid-colored shadows to create depth without gradients or texture noise. The color palette is vivid and highly saturated, featuring a dominant {{primary_color}} tone that contrasts cleanly with the subject, while distinct {{accent_color}} elements provide visual pop and energy. The composition is clean and centered, conveying a mood of approachability and professionalism. The rendering is perfectly smooth, digital, and crisp.

title: Linear Elegance
description: Ce style minimaliste se distingue par un dessin au trait continu fluide sur un fond de papier texturé blanc cassé. L'œuvre capture l'essence du sujet avec une simplicité sophistiquée, rehaussée par de subtiles touches d'aquarelle pastel.
prompt: A sophisticated continuous line drawing depicting {{subject}}, created with a single, fluid black ink stroke that defines the form without lifting the pen. The style emphasizes negative space, organic curves, and elegant simplicity. The background is a high-quality, textured off-white paper with visible grain. Incorporate a soft, artistic splash of {{primary_color}} watercolor wash to suggest volume, paired with a faint hint of {{accent_color}} for delicate emphasis. The rendering is ultra-minimalist, flat, and clean, combining vector precision with analog warmth. Lighting is even and flat to highlight the line work, minimal, vector style, clean lines, high contrast, fine art, ink illustration, 2d, simple, abstract.

title: Pastel Clay
prompt: A premium 3D isometric rendering of {{subject}}, designed with a minimalist and cute aesthetic. The object features a smooth, matte finish resembling soft clay or high-quality silicone, with rounded edges and simplified geometry. The color palette utilizes soft {{primary_color}} as the dominant hue, complemented by subtle {{accent_color}} details to create a gentle contrast. The lighting is incredibly soft and diffuse, simulating global illumination with ambient occlusion, resulting in creamy, non-intrusive shadows and a lack of harsh specular highlights. The rendering is ultra-clean and noise-free, evoking a sense of playfulness and modern UI design. The subject is composited on a clean {{background_color}} surface, ensuring distinct edges for easy isolation, c4d, blender render, unreal engine 5, toy-like, volumetric soft light, 8k resolution, pastel tones, smooth shading, high fidelity.
background_prompt: A soft, minimalist 3D abstract environment featuring smooth geometric shapes like spheres, rounded cubes, and flowing curves. The scene is rendered with a matte, clay-like texture in shades of {{primary_color}} and {{accent_color}}. Soft, diffuse lighting creates gentle gradients on the forms. The elements are arranged to frame a central empty space, set against a seamless {{background_color}} backdrop, creating a calm and playful atmosphere perfect for a product showcase.

title: Corporate Sketch
description: Ce style se caractérise par une illustration vectorielle minimaliste aux contours noirs façon croquis et aux aplats de couleurs unies sans ombrage. L'esthétique est épurée et professionnelle, utilisant largement l'espace négatif blanc pour une clarté maximale.
prompt: A professional minimalist vector illustration of {{subject}}, designed in a clean corporate art style. The rendering relies on distinct, hand-drawn black ink outlines that are slightly sketchy yet confident, clearly defining forms without rigid geometry. Coloration consists strictly of flat, solid blocks of {{primary_color}} for main elements and {{accent_color}} for highlights, with absolutely no gradients, shadows, or texturing. Large areas of white negative space are integrated into the figures. The composition is isolated against a pure white background, emphasizing simplicity and communication. 2D, flat design, vector graphics, white background, no shading, minimal, corporate art, high contrast, clean lines, editorial illustration.
background_prompt: A minimal, abstract background setting featuring sparse architectural lines and simple geometric forms drawn in a sketchy black outline style. The environment uses flat fills of {{primary_color}} and {{accent_color}} to suggest spatial structure without visual clutter. The design relies heavily on white negative space and complete 2D flatness, creating a clean, professional atmosphere suitable for corporate presentations or editorial layouts.

title: Risograph Spotlight
description: Ce style unique combine l'illustration vectorielle plate avec une texture granuleuse et bruyante rappelant l'impression risographique ou le dessin à la craie. Il se distingue par un éclairage dramatique en forme de cône (spotlight) qui crée un contraste géométrique net entre les zones éclairées et les ombres.
prompt: A flat editorial illustration of {{subject}} rendered in a textured risograph art style. The scene is defined by a dramatic, hard-edged cone of light that cuts through the composition, brightly illuminating the {{subject}} while casting the surrounding areas into deep, flat shadows. The visual texture is heavy and tactile, featuring a grainy, speckled noise overlay that mimics chalk, pastel, or coarse paper printing. The color palette is limited and retro-modern, dominated by shades of {{primary_color}} with striking details in {{accent_color}}. The rendering avoids realistic 3D depth, opting for stylized 2D shapes with slightly imperfect, organic edges. The atmosphere is cozy, whimsical, and creative, reminiscent of high-end tech blog illustrations or indie magazine art, grainy texture, risograph print, hard shadows, flat design, editorial illustration, noise overlay, retro palette, 2D vector art, textured paper, high contrast lighting.

title: Spotlight Schematic
description: Ce style unique imite une illustration technique isométrique tracée au trait fin sur un papier beige texturé et granuleux. Il se distingue par un cône de lumière géométrique et translucide qui met en valeur le sujet central, contrastant avec le minimalisme du reste de la composition.
prompt: A precise, minimalist technical illustration of {{subject}} rendered in fine, uniform lines of {{primary_color}} against a background of textured, speckled beige paper. The composition is defined by a striking lighting effect: a distinct, geometric cone of translucent {{accent_color}} light highlights the central focal point of the {{subject}}, washing it in color while leaving the surrounding areas as simple, unshaded line work. The aesthetic combines vintage architectural drafting with clean vector art in an isometric or axonometric perspective. The paper texture is prominent and tactile, adding grain to the clean lines. No shadows or gradients outside the specific light beam, emphasizing a schematic and analytical mood.

title: Shadow Studio
description: Ce style capture l'essence de la photographie de produit minimaliste avec un éclairage solaire dur et direct qui crée des ombres géométriques tranchées. L'atmosphère est propre, moderne et réaliste, mettant en valeur le sujet par un jeu de contrastes forts entre la lumière vive et les zones d'ombre profondes.
prompt: A professional, high-angle studio product photograph of {{subject}}, showcasing a clean and modern minimalist aesthetic. The scene is illuminated by harsh, direct natural sunlight, casting sharp, diagonal geometric shadows across the {{subject}} and the surrounding surface, mimicking light filtering through a window frame or blinds. The composition is uncluttered, focusing entirely on the texture and form of the object. The color grading is bright and airy, utilizing {{primary_color}} as the dominant tone for the subject's highlights, while {{accent_color}} provides subtle contrast in the details or branding elements. The surface texture is smooth, matte, and pristine. The lighting creates a high-contrast look with deep, defined blacks and blown-out whites in the sun-drenched areas, evoking a warm, lazy afternoon atmosphere suitable for high-end mockups, photorealistic, hard lighting, shadow play, 8k, ultra detailed, depth of field, ray tracing, sharp focus, commercial photography.
background_prompt: A pristine, minimalist surface composed of smooth, matte white or light grey material, bathed in bright, hard natural sunlight. Sharp, distinct diagonal shadows cut across the scene, creating a strong geometric pattern of light and dark, suggestive of a window frame or architectural element out of view. The atmosphere is clean and airy, with subtle ambient reflections of {{primary_color}} and {{accent_color}} bouncing off the neutral ground. The texture is uniform and high-quality, designed to create a sense of depth through the interplay of harsh light and deep shadow without any central subject.
